name: Timberland Garrison Slide
description: Slide into progressive sustainable style with the Timberland Garrison Slide. Show that you deeply care about your environment in these ultra-comfy slides which include at least 50% of recycled plastic and a comfortable EVA footbed. Make a sustainable lifestyle your fashion statement with the Timberland Garrison Slide.  The rubber lug outsole offers traction. The EVA-blend foam provides rebound cushioning.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Introducing the first-ever Max Air unit designed specifically for Nike Sportswear, the Nike Air Max 270 delivers visible air and unbelievable comfort under every step. It has callbacks to the original 1991 Air Max 180 on its exaggerated tongue top and heritage tongue logo while also being upgraded for modern comfort.  Large volume Max Air unit delivers responsive cushioning. Neoprene stretch bootie construction offers a snug fit. 3-piece midsole offers durability and a smooth transition. Mono-mesh window in the quarter and engineered mesh in the forefoot provide durability. Rubber toe tip offers durability in high-wear areas. Design lines, tongue logo, and exaggerated tongue top nod to the original Air Max 180 of 1991.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8
description: The Swoosh pair that moved on from the court to the streets, and soon became the everyday icon. The Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8 elevates the look of the ’82 original profile with a thicker midsole and more bouncy cushioning. This premium variant of the 2007 AF1 pair, stays true to its original with the crisp leather, bold accents, and heritage colours. The premium leather upper adds a plush look to this casual sneaker while the outsole ties it all together. Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8 features:   Stitched leather overlays on the upper add heritage style, durability, and support. Perforations in the upper offer breathability. Foam midsole supports and comforts your feet. Nike Air cushioning adds lightweight, all-day comfort. Padded, low-cut collar looks sleek and supports the ankle. Rubber outsole has a circular pattern for excellent traction and durability.

name: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: The streetwear statement shoe from the ‘90s basketball era! Initially released and coveted as the on-court icon, the Nike Air More Uptempo is your big, bold, and innovative pair of sneakers. The powerfully built profile, along with the Nike Air underfoot unit, adds to its 20-year-old charm. The distinctive over-branding makes this Nike Air pair even more difficult to miss! Nike Air More Uptempo features:  Real and synthetic leather on the upper offer durability. Air units provide lightweight and responsive cushioning. Elastic gores on the upper help create a snug, comfortable fit. Perforations on upper add breathability. Rubber outsole delivers durable multi-surface traction. Loop pulls on tongue and heel eases the process of wearing while adding to its looks. Bold, iconic "AIR" branding on upper reps the brand. A padded collar supports the ankles. Lace hooks add to its distinctive looks.

name: Vans SK8 Hi Radical Positivity
description: Game-changing sneakers that keep you moving! The Vans SK8 Hi Radical Positivity flaunts the legendary high-top design that hits at the ankle for an elevated look and comfort. The leather upper brings an athletic edge, while the padded collar and rubber outsole ensure a plush feel and smooth ride.  Vulcanized construction enhances durability.

name: Vans Old Skool Radical Positivity
description: The first to bare the iconic ‘Jazz’ side stripe, the Vans Old Skool Radical Positivity is an easy, casual addition to your outfit. A constant in most shoe closets, this classic sneaker has transitioned from a sub-culture staple to a mainstream favourite over the years. This low-top, lace-up skate shoe is loved for its clean aesthetics, stability, and comfort. This ‘Off the Wall’ canvas creation also boasts of a sturdy upper, robust ankle support, and a sporty, minimalist look that goes with anything! Vans Old Skool Radical Positivity features:   Canvas and leather uppers add breathability to the pair. Padded collars provide support and flexibility. Re-enforced toecaps withstand repeated wear. Signature rubber waffle outsoles offer traction.

name: adidas D.O.N. Issue 3
description: Unleash beast mode on the court with the adidas D.O.N. Issue 3. Built for Donovan Mitchell’s explosive game style, these sneakers offer lightweight comfort and responsiveness that keeps you supported through your vertical jumps and slam dunks. Channeling the mind-over-matter mentality of the ‘Spida’ on the court, the adidas D.O.N. Issue 3 makes sure that nothing can keep you down on the hardwood adidas D.O.N. Issue 3 features:  TPU overlayed toe cap reduces internal foot movement and offers stability. Lightstrike midsole increases the cushioning underfoot and reduces cleat pressure. TPU insert adds lateral stability for dynamic cuts. Locked-down heel delivers a comfortably snug fit.

name: Nike Air Huarache
description: This new iteration of a classic mixes tried-and-true elements with modern style.  The upper features a combination of leather paneling, thermoplastic hardware, neoprene, and spandex for an ultra-comfortable and flexible fit. Dynamic Fit sleeve makes for a custom fit. Phylon™ midsole supplies lightweight cushioning, while Air-Sole® units in the forefoot and heel offer maximum impact protection. Rubber outsole with Waffle® pattern provides traction and durability, and includes forefoot flex grooves for flexibility.

name: Converse Pro Leather
description: Put on classic style by Converse.  Leather upper for durability and style. Lunarlon cushioning for all-day comfort. Rubber outsole for durability and traction.

name: Converse All Star BB Evo
description: Lace-up and slam dunk with the Converse All Star BB Evo. Made with a smooth textile upper and meshed air inlet, this top-notch basketball sneaker ensures improved breathability for a clean, fresh fit. Get noticed for your style statement on the floor with the high-performance All Star BB Evo from Converse!  Nike React drop-in midsole provides optimal energy return with each stride. Rubber cup sole enables multi-directional traction and durability at high-abrasion areas.

name: Converse NBA Jam UNT1TL3D
description: Go Boomshakalaka on the court in the Converse NBA Jam UNT1TL3D. Inspired by the ‘90s basketball video game NBA Jam, these silhouettes marry your love for video games and sports to make a canvas upper sneaker in high-top form. Featuring bold Star Chevron and All Star patches joined by NBA Jam references on the tongue and sockliner, the Converse NBA Jam UNT1TL3D adds the charm of the bygone era to your sporty rotation. Converse NBA Jam UNT1TL3D features:  “Player 1” and “Player 2” on tongue labels bring a nostalgic vibe. OrthoLite sockliner provides a comfortable and breathable feel. Diagonal midsole stripes add texture and style to the midsole. A multicoloured license plate on the heel adds extra flair.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 NBA
description: Step up your game day look and show off your team spirit in the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 NBA. Crafted with authentic NBA jerseys, these sneakers let you flaunt your love for the game and pride for your team. Made from recycled water bottles, these sustainable shoes make you feel good in more ways than one. Part of a limited edition launch with each pair of shoes labelled 1 of 250, the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 NBA lets you keep your style exclusive.  Sustainable sockliner provides breathability and comfort. The rubber outsole delivers traction and durability.

name: Nike Kyrie Low 4
description: Channel your killer instincts on the hardwood with the Nike Kyrie Low 4. Crafted with an ultra-responsive, lean, and lightweight design, these shoes let you focus on the fundamentals of the game while stripping away unnecessary components. Featuring two-pronged ‘fingers’ in the lace front, these shoes lock your feet over the footbed as the laces tighten and provide a snug fit. Embedded with a data-informed, computer-generated traction pattern, these silhouettes offer a heightened grip on the floor, perfect for sudden movements, and quick crossovers. Constructed with a sleek, sculpted design, the Nike Kyrie Low 4 keeps things simple but deadly. Nike Kyrie Low 4 features:  Lightweight, grid-patterned mesh offers breathability and comfort. A padded, contoured collar is raised at the back and fits snugly over the Achilles tendon. The sleek midsole gives a fast and streamlined look. Cushlon and Zoom Air unit provide a smooth and responsive ride. The rubber outsole offers maximum control and traction.

name: Nike Kyrie Low 4
description: Channel your killer instincts on the hardwood with the Nike Kyrie Low 4. Crafted with an ultra-responsive, lean, and lightweight design, these shoes let you focus on the fundamentals of the game while stripping away unnecessary components. Featuring two-pronged ‘fingers’ in the lace front, these shoes lock your feet over the footbed as the laces tighten and provide a snug fit. Embedded with a data-informed, computer-generated traction pattern, these silhouettes offer a heightened grip on the floor, perfect for sudden movements, and quick crossovers. Constructed with a sleek, sculpted design, the Nike Kyrie Low 4 keeps things simple but deadly. Nike Kyrie Low 4 features:  Lightweight, grid-patterned mesh offers breathability and comfort. A padded, contoured collar is raised at the back and fits snugly over the Achilles tendon. The sleek midsole gives a fast and streamlined look. Cushlon and Zoom Air unit provide a smooth and responsive ride. The rubber outsole offers maximum control and traction.

name: Converse Weapon CX
description: Feel the renewed energy of the Converse Weapon CX. A completely transformed version of the on-court icon from 1986, these sneakers flaunt an archival colour blocking design that adds a sleek look to your rotation. The Y-bar panelling and woven tongue pay homage toConverse’s history, while the exaggerated but lightweight CX midsole and CX sock liner represent the brand’s new ethos. Sporting the iconic Star Chevron branding on the collar, the Converse Weapon CX lets you make a bold statement with your style. Converse Weapon CX  Mid-top shoe design with a premium leather upper offers a statement look. PU foam collar gives stability and comfort. CX foam sock liner and exaggerated midsole provide cushioning and responsiveness. Wrapped rubber outsole offers optimal traction and durability.

name: Nike KD 14
description: Slay the competition on the court, ‘Slim Reaper’ style, with the Nike KD 14. Designed for versatile players like Kevin Durant, these silhouettes offer unmatched control through nail-biting games. Fitted with full-length Zoom Air cushioning and Cushlon foam, these shoes provide an ultra-responsive sensation through lethal crossovers and efficient blocks. Equipped with a hook-and-loop strap that wraps over the lace front, these shoes keep your feet supported and stable throughout the game. With a stylish construction that takes inspiration from the shape of the grim reaper’s scythe, the Nike KD 14 ensures that you reap all the shots on the hardwood. Nike KD 14 features:  Multilayer mesh upper keeps feet dry and comfortable. The stiff piece on the outer edge provides midfoot stability. Grooved and ridges on the sole offer multidirectional traction and elevated court feel.

name: Jordan Retro 12
description: Own the game with the legendary style of the Jordan Retro 12. One of the most durable Air Jordans of all time, these sneakers mark the return of Tinker Hatfield’s celebrated 1996 design. First, to bring the revolutionary Zoom Air cushioning to the signature line, these silhouettes offer bold and striking elegance, with elevated comfort and responsiveness. Celebrating the heritage that’s rooted in sport and reinforced with excellence, the Jordan Retro 12 lets you dream beyond expectations and create your own destiny. Jordan Retro 12 features:  Genuine leather and textile materials in the upper provide a sleek and classic look. Carbon fibre shank provides flexibility and propulsion. Foam midsole with full-length Zoom Air cushioning offers comfort and responsiveness. The rubber outsole delivers traction and durability.

name: Converse All Star BB Jet Team
description: Charge forward with the unmatched velocity of the Converse All Star BB Jet Team. Made for players who are ready to take off at any moment, these sneakers give you a smooth and responsive ride on the court. The mixed-material upper of synthetic suede and ripstop nylon strips off the excess weight and gives you a comfortable and breathable feel through your games. Featuring Nike Zoom cushioning in the heel and forefoot, these sneakers allow you to make smooth transitions and move with precision. Sporting a low-cut collar with bootie construction that gives a lightweight and locked-in feel, the Converse All Star BB Jet Team lets you hit the ground running. Converse All Star BB Jet Team features:  Ortholite sock liner provides a comfortable and relaxed feel. Moulded fiberglass Converse Speed Plate enhances stability and responsiveness. Rubber outsole with multi-directional tread pattern maximizes traction and offers durability.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8
description: Powerful sneakers for a powerful stride! The Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8 features a perfectly colourful splash and contrast details to set itself apart – on and off the track. The Swoosh along with smooth leather construction and bold design offers a captivating look. The branding at the barely see-through tooling, embroidery on the heel tab, dubrae stick, and tongue tab sticks out to let you rule the streets – Nike style!  Lace-up closure ensures a snug fit.

name: Nike Zoom Freak 3
description: Unleash your inner freak on the hardwood with the Nike Zoom Freak 3. Capturing Giannis’ freaky athleticism in sleek and high-performance silhouettes, these shoes offer a fine-tuned fit, forefoot responsiveness, and multi-directional traction that helps you stay in control throughout. The hollowed-out and lightweight midsole features two Zoom Air units that compress under the weight and give you maximum energy return with every stride. Sporting a moulded hook-and-loop strap made with flexible and durable TPU, these sneakers reduce internal foot movement by harnessing your feet over the cushioning. From erratic Euro steps to powerful defences, the Nike Zoom Freak 3 supports you through all your crazy gameplays on the court. Nike Zoom Freak 3 features:  Standard lacing offers a locked-in feel. The tongue pull tab prevents chafing. Reinforced toe provides durability. Cut-outs in the foam under the toe and heel help reduce overall weight. Reverse Swoosh design offers a dash of style and brand rep. Moulded grooves in the rubber outsole help the shoe flex. The computer-generated outsole provides optimized ground contact in multiple directions.

name: Jordan Delta 2
description: Make every step count with the Jordan Delta 2. Behold the revolution with these versatile, space-age lifestyle sneakers. These silhouettes flaunt a design that is expressive and comfortable from the inside out. Crafted from a mix of materials, these shoes feature a plush, lightweight React foam underfoot that keeps you going all day. Offering an irresistible combo of durability, comfort, and attitude that’s Jordan to the core, these sneakers flaunt a fresh and fearless style that pairs well with practically any outfit. Relish in the luxe design of the Jordan Delta 2 and experience resilience and responsiveness like never before. Jordan Delta 2 features:  Multilayered, mixed material upper looks both high-tech and handcrafted. Woven tongue label with micrographics adds a pop of style and brand rep. The heel pull tab enables easy on and off. Molded rubber mudguard around the outer midfoot provides side-to-side stability. The rubber outsole delivers traction and durability.

name: adidas Originals NMD R1.V2
description: Explore the urban landscape in the super comfortable adidas NMD R1.V2. Hitting refresh on the heritage design, these shoes boast a signature heel design that pops with a color fade heel loop. The Boost midsole gives you soft cushioning and superior bounce with every step. The midsole plugs on the sides set you up with legendary NMD style. Slip into these shoes and show up in bright flashes of color. adidas NMD R1.V2 features:  Lace closure keeps your feet secure. Textile upper delivers superior breathability. Boost midsole gives you a smooth ride on multiple surfaces. Rubber outsole ensures durability.

name: Jordan Series 02
description: Swing for the fence in the Jordan Series 02. Narrating the story of MJ’s childhood and how he came to be the G.O.A.T., these shoes have a stretchy design that accommodates wider feet. The outsole of these sneakers features circular traction inspired by the Air Jordan 1. The message moulded into the rubber tells the story of MJ’s backyard sports battles with his older brother, Larry. The “45/2” nods to the number MJ and Larry wore until they ended up on the same team. The “SWING FOR THE FENCE” on the sock liner quotes a letter from Larry and speaks of MJ’s attitude in life. Crowned as the first vulcanized silhouette by the Jordan brand, the Jordan Series 02 lets you channel the fierceness of the King with each step.  Jordan Series 02 features:  Canvas and suede blended upper offers a clean and premium look. Woven tongue label provides comfort. Perforated toes offer breathability and ample ventilation. Triangular cut-outs on the side are filled with stretchy material to deliver flexibility. High sidewalls provide durability and stability.

name: PUMA RS Dreamer Mid
description: Stay faster forever with the PUMA RS-Dreamer Mid. Reimagined into an exceptionally bold design, this durable court-ready sneaker ensures superior stability and control when you make game moves on the floor. Drive to the basket and score with thumping authority in the PUMA RS-Dreamer Mid! PUMA RS-Dreamer Mid features:  Dynamic lacing system offers a secure, locked-in fit. Full-length profoam midsole offers optimal energy return with every stride. The sticky rubber outsole offers superior grip and traction at high-abrasion areas.

name: Nike LeBron XVIII
description: DESIGNED FOR A KING. Designed specifically for LeBron, Nike Basketball's largest heel Max Air unit to date absorbs more force than previous designs. Visible, maximum-volume Zoom Air units under the ball of the foot provide quick, continuous responsiveness to generate fast-paced action. ONE OF KIND DETAIL. KnitPosite is a combination of Flyknit construction and pre-twisted, heat-molded yarns that form swirled patterns. The result is light, durable and supportive, with each shoe having a look that's subtly one-of-a-kind.  Soft foam pod directly under the Max Air unit adds cushioning in the heel. Stabilizing plastic clip wraps around heel to lock you in.

name: Jordan Retro 12
description: Own the game with the legendary style of the Jordan Retro 12. One of the most durable Air Jordans of all time, these sneakers mark the return of Tinker Hatfield’s celebrated 1996 design. First, to bring the revolutionary Zoom Air cushioning to the signature line, these silhouettes offer bold and striking elegance, with elevated comfort and responsiveness. Celebrating the heritage that’s rooted in sport and reinforced with excellence, the Jordan Retro 12 lets you dream beyond expectations and create your own destiny. Jordan Retro 12 features:  Genuine leather and textile materials in the upper provide a sleek and classic look. Carbon fibre shank provides flexibility and propulsion. Foam midsole with full-length Zoom Air cushioning offers comfort and responsiveness. The rubber outsole delivers traction and durability.

name: Nike Air Zoom G.T. Run
description: Maximize your performance with the Nike Air Zoom G.T. Run. Designed for players who can do it all, these on-court shoes feature a lightweight upper, stacked-up cushioning system, and multidirectional micro-grip that supports your erratic gameplay. Ultra-light and extra-supportive in key areas, these sneakers provide a snug and consistent feel that helps you maximize momentum and outlast your competition. These silhouettes feature a multilayered cushioning system with a React Foam sock liner right underneath your feet, followed by a Zoom Air unit that covers most of your forefoot. Resting over a full-length React Foam footbed and another Zoom Air unit in the forefoot, these shoes offer a smooth ride that feels like you are floating on air. Carefully crafted to help you dominate the hardwood, the Nike Air Zoom G.T. Run takes your game to new and unexpected levels. Nike Air Zoom G.T. Run features:  Two-layer mesh upper offers a breathable and broken-in feel. Lightweight material with haptic print details gives durability. Padded, mid-high collar provides comfort and support around the ankle without sacrificing agility. Foam tongue molds to the feet and elevates lace pressure. The heel pull tab enables easy on and off.  Nike React Foam in the midsole offers durability and responsiveness. A thin rubber outsole with curvy ridges gives multidirectional traction and flexibility. Cutaway design at the arch and perforated rubber reduces weight.

name: Reebok Beatnik Sandals
description: Get a low-key, bohemian look with the Rebook Beatnik Sandals. Featuring a textile upper with saturated colourway, these sandals bring ease and comfort in a minimalistic design. The slip-on construction ensures fuss-free wear, while the deep ridges on the outsole deliver a fierce and bold finish.  Heel strap and a hook-and-loop closure strap provide a snug fit. Rubber outsole offers superior traction and grip.

name: Reebok Beatnik Sandals
description: Get a low-key, bohemian look with the Rebook Beatnik Sandals. Featuring a textile upper with saturated colourway, these sandals bring ease and comfort in a minimalistic design. The slip-on construction ensures fuss-free wear, while the deep ridges on the outsole deliver a fierce and bold finish.  Heel strap and a hook-and-loop closure strap provide a snug fit. Rubber outsole offers superior traction and grip.

name: Reebok Beatnik Sandals
description: Get a low-key, bohemian look with the Rebook Beatnik Sandals. Featuring a textile upper with saturated colourway, these sandals bring ease and comfort in a minimalistic design. The slip-on construction ensures fuss-free wear, while the deep ridges on the outsole deliver a fierce and bold finish.  Heel strap and a hook-and-loop closure strap provide a snug fit. Rubber outsole offers superior traction and grip.

name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 2
description: Cover any distance with the unparalleled cushioning and energy return you crave in the Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 2. Decked out with an updated upper with Flywire technology for breathability, the Nike React technology will make you rethink running comfort. The rocker-shaped foam provides support for the three phases of a runner’s stride: flexibility when the foot rises off the ground, smooth ride when the foot is moving forward, and cushioning at ground contact. The increased rubber at the outsole ensures a stable ride, while you turn heads with classic Nike flair. Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit 2 features:  The Flywire technology offers extra support and stability through the midfoot. Less material between the insole and midsole creates a more responsive experience. The cushioned collar provides soft comfort. The wide shape ensures a more stable ride. The loop at the heel allows easy on and off.  * Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

name: PUMA RS Dreamer Mid
description: Stay faster forever with the PUMA RS-Dreamer Mid. Reimagined into an exceptionally bold design, this durable court-ready sneaker ensures superior stability and control when you make game moves on the floor. Drive to the basket and score with thumping authority in the PUMA RS-Dreamer Mid! PUMA RS-Dreamer Mid features:  Dynamic lacing system offers a secure, locked-in fit. Full-length profoam midsole offers optimal energy return with every stride. The sticky rubber outsole offers superior grip and traction at high-abrasion areas.

name: Jordan Zion 1
description: Be an unmatched force of athleticism and speed on the hardwood in the Jordan Zion 1. Featuring a design inspired by the duality of Zion’s superhuman ability and humility, these sneakers let you rule the court with confidence. The full-length Air Strobel unit stacked with a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot gives you plush cushioning and rapid responsiveness with each step. Lightweight, stable, and strong, the Jordan Zion 1 lets you take down the defenses like ‘Zanos’. Jordan Zion 1 features:  The dynamic and flexible tongue with targeted padding over the top eases lace pressure and provides plush comfort. The two-loop band with high sidewalls offers security and stability. Multidirectional outsole pattern delivers optimal traction and durability.

name: Nike Air Max 2021
description: Maxed out with 'air' and flair! The Nike Air Max sphere brings comfort without compromising on performance. Including a mesh and woven textile, the airy upper sits on top of a dual-pressure Air-sole unit for comfort that lasts. Made from at least 20% recycled materials by weight, these sneakers let you leave a smaller carbon footprint behind thanks to its sustainable style. With additional details like webbing pull tabs and floating eye-stays, you'll turn heads wherever you go for all the right reasons! Nike Air Max sphere features:  The upper including an engineered mesh, woven textile, and no-sew skins makes it durable, lightweight, and airy. The round laces allow you to customize your fit. The padded, low-cut collar looks sleek and feels great. The overlays on the sides and heel add durability and depth. The dual-pressure Air-sole unit works in unison with a collapsible cage, delivering a brand-new level of comfort. The full-length rubber outsole ensures a grippy ride.

name: Nike LeBron XVIII Low
description: Elevate your greatness in the Nike LeBron XVIII Low. Bringing back the 17’s cushioning system to provide an optimal balance of comfort and responsiveness, these sneakers keep you prepped to take control of the game. Featuring a lightweight upper crafted with a mix of materials and no-sew overlays, these silhouettes offer you a full-foot containment without compromising on ankle mobility. The Max Air unit under the heel provides impact cushioning for big and strong players such as yourself, while the full-length React technology delivers responsiveness for smooth transitions and crossovers. A high flying symbol of unstoppable power and speed, the Nike LeBron XVIII Low lets you channel the domineering force of LeBron on the court. Nike LeBron XVIII Low feature:  Woven materials in the upper provide a lightweight feel and durability. No-sew overlays offer structure and support. The padded collar protects the ankles. Light, padded tongue delivers comfort and breathability. External molded heel clip provides lightweight support and a locked-in feel. Rubber outsole with diamond cutouts offers durability and traction.

name: adidas Originals NMD R1
description: Eye-Catching adidas OriginalsKnown for both style and comfort, adidas provides an incredible adaption of the styling of three past shoe stars. The adidas Originals NMD R1 combines the unique silhouette of the Micropacer, Boston Super, and Rising Star into a whole new fusion. This masterpiece offers extreme comfort paired with the eye-catching style you have come to know and love from the adidas brand.NMDs for EverydayWhether you are out for a casual stroll or you are heading to the big game, adidas Originals NMD R1s are the perfect pair of kicks to sport any day of the week. With a snug and comfortable fit, these unique shoes are designed with high-quality components that provide support and extreme cushioning. With EVA plugs embedded in the soles, these shoes are more than just a good time. Their flexible but snug fit makes them a go-to shoe for any daily activity.adidas Originals NMD R1 features:• Primeknit, adaptive knit, and mesh allow you to customize the look and feel of your shoes.• NMD branded pull tab makes slipping these shoes on and off a cinch.• Adaptive fit provides ultimate comfort on the go.• Full-length Boost midsole and EVA plugs embedded in the sole provide comfort for daily use.• Three different patterns on the rubber outsole allow for varying grip as needed. • Hexagonal patches and grooves on the outsole provide flexibility and unique style.

name: New Balance 574 Rugged
description: Let your style do the talking with the New Balance 574 Rugged. Designed with classic mesh and premium suede upper, these sneakers offer an everyday statement that reflects their ‘80s heritage. The iconic die-cut ‘N’ logos on each lateral and medial side along with New Balance branding on the tongue and heel ensure a fun and fashionable fit for your active lifestyle. New Balance 574 Rugged features:  Reflective detailing adds a pop of style. EVA foam sole with the brand’s signature ENCAP technology in the heel provides dynamic support and comfort. Carbon rubber outsole with lugged traction enables excellent traction, durability, and grip.

name: Reebok Question Mid
description: Originally designed for Allen “The Answer” Iverson, the Reebok Question Mid pair is all about self-expression. Inspired by the Hall of Famer’s style on and off the court, this Reebok pair brings basketball style to the streets. Featuring a leather upper and a chunky midsole with hexagonal cushioning peeking out from its outsole, these shoes offer a cushioned and responsive step with an amped up look. Reebok Power Rangers Question Mid features:   Supple nubuck upper with patent leather toe cap gives the upper a standout style. Debossed Vector logo on sides, tongue, and outsole reps the brand. Soft Hexalite hexagonal cushioning provides comfort and protects your feet. The rubber outsole offers durability and traction.

name: Nike PG 5
description: Go hard with every play in the Nike PG 5. The lightweight, full-length Nike Air Strobel of these shoes offers you the cushioning and comfort you need to thrive during long games. All over flexibility helps you transition smoothly between both ends of the court. Designed to support players with a smooth and reliably steady game, these silhouettes combine an agile low-profile with plush, bouncy cushioning that makes you feel like you are walking on clouds. Delivering enhanced support for your passes and pull-up jumpers, the Nike PG 5 lets you channel the two-way game of Paul George on the hardwood.  Lace closure provides a snug and locked-in feel. A multi-directional tread pattern on the outsole delivers traction and durability.

name: Nike Kyrie 7
description: Unwrap creativity and comfort with the Nike Kyrie 7. Quick, smooth, and comfortable, these sneakers draw inspiration from Kyrie’s ball-handling skills on court and let you move around with ease. The next-generation energy return design helps hoopers take the first step quicker and blow away the defenders with speed and agility. ‘Kyrieddle’ your opponents with the undeniable control of 360-degree computer-generated traction pattern and fast movement through responsive cushion. Nike Kyrie 7 features:  Mesh details on the upper offers breathability and helps you move quickly. The laces feed through molded fins that pull down over the forefoot while lacing up. Padded collar supports the Achilles tendon. Air Zoom Turbo unit makes it comfortable and gives responsive cushioning. Rubber outsole wrapped with the inner foot provides superior traction. Features “KI” logo on tongue, embroidered Kyrie signature on the heel, and inner tongue label.

name: adidas Ultraboost DNA
description: Every run is a chance to push your boundaries. And what better way to do it than in the adidas Ultraboost DNA! Crafted with a Primeknit forefoot that stretches comfortably and offering incredible energy return, this silhouette sets a new standard for running shoes. Complete with an external butterfly heel counter for stability and a rubber outsole that delivers a grippy ride, it's time to put in the work! adidas Ultraboost DNA features:  The four-way stretch heel works with the tongue to deliver dynamic support and fit. The full-length boost midsole offers energy return and cushioning. The Torsion System bone enables a smoother transition during heelstrike-to-midfoot stance transition. Weight: 10.9 oz.

name: adidas Ultraboost DNA
description: Every run is a chance to push your boundaries. And what better way to do it than in the adidas Ultraboost DNA! Crafted with a Primeknit forefoot that stretches comfortably and offering incredible energy return, this silhouette sets a new standard for running shoes. Complete with an external butterfly heel counter for stability and a rubber outsole that delivers a grippy ride, it's time to put in the work! adidas Ultraboost DNA features:  The four-way stretch heel works with the tongue to deliver dynamic support and fit. The full-length boost midsole offers energy return and cushioning. The Torsion System bone enables a smoother transition during heelstrike-to-midfoot stance transition. Weight: 10.9 oz.

name: PUMA RS Dreamer
description: For the innovators and the dreamers, the PUMA RS-X Dreamer is the modern silhouette you need in your rotation.  Dynamic lacing system offers a firm, locked-in. Mesh upper with leather and suede overlays offers cool comfort and durability. Molded sockliner feels soft and comfortable underfoot. Full-length profoam midsole offers superior responsiveness and energy return. Sticky rubber and engineered traction pattern provides incredible grip and traction.

name: Vans Ult Waffle
description: Get ready for a smooth ride with the Vans Ult Waffle. Born out of the legendary collaboration between Vans and SE Bikes, these sneakers bring together the best of high-end performance and street-chic styling. The suede and engineered mesh enhances breathability and features a unique design. With a newly designed translucent outsole, these shoes give a sneak-peek of the interior midsole for an exquisite “what you see, is what you get” look and feel. Vans Ult Waffle features:  The asymmetrical vamp offers a sporty and modern look. The moulded insole and midsole ensure a perfect fit. A built-in shank provides additional support. A single outsole unit that blends cupsole construction with an in-built moulded footbed delivers superior cushioning and durability.

name: Jordan Retro 6
description: In order to appreciate the Jordan Retro 6, you have to start at the beginning. It all started in 1991, when the original Air Jordan VI was released – it was the first Jordan with an internal bootie and it boasted a striking design, Porsche-inspired pull tab and Vis-Air® unit. It was also the shoe MJ wore as he captured both the league and Finals MVP. The Jordan Retro 6 is a retroed version of that classic shoe, offering a fresh look with the same iconic details.  This shoe comes specially packaged in a "box within a box" to keep the original box from being damaged and helps to keep it in "collector's condition." The upper is a combination of leather and synthetics with perforated details and sleek designs throughout. The pull tab remains the same and the midsole cushioning provides comfort with polyurethane, a Vis-Air® unit in the heel and an Air® unit in the forefoot. The sole is comprised of solid and translucent rubber with a unique traction pattern for performance and style. Wt. 18.0 oz.

name: Vans SK8 Hi
description: The Classic Skate Shoe, Upgraded Vans Canada Sk8-Hi Shoes are the stuff of legends. The ever-popular shoes come complete with Vans branding on the tongue, and a stripe on the outer edges. The upper is made from Wolverine suede treated with Scotchgard, while the midsole is softly and lightly lined, and the rubber outsole stands up to scrapes and scuffs. Vans Canada Sk8-Hi Shoes Features: • Wolverine suede is treated with Scotchgard to keep feet dry in a variety of conditions.• Soft lined midsole is comfortable and lightweight.• Rubber outsole is durable, flexible, and stands up to scrapes and scuffs.• Reinforced toe caps stand up to wear and tear, and padded collars provide additional support.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star HI
description: Flex your casual vibe to the limit with the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star HI. The canvas upper keeps you comfortable at all times, while the digitally printed tune squad graphic kicks up the style quotient. Making a splash, the pop color CK mesh lining makes a bold statement. Slip into these shoes and turn heads with a fun, casual look. Converse Chuck Taylor All Star HI features:  Screen printed logo on the tongues adds a hit of branded style. Rubber midsole gives you soft cushioning. Rubber outsole delivers powerful traction on a variety of surfaces.

name: Nike LeBron XVIII Low
description: Elevate your greatness in the Nike LeBron XVIII Low. Bringing back the 17’s cushioning system to provide an optimal balance of comfort and responsiveness, these sneakers keep you prepped to take control of the game. Featuring a lightweight upper crafted with a mix of materials and no-sew overlays, these silhouettes offer you a full-foot containment without compromising on ankle mobility. The Max Air unit under the heel provides impact cushioning for big and strong players such as yourself, while the full-length React technology delivers responsiveness for smooth transitions and crossovers. A high flying symbol of unstoppable power and speed, the Nike LeBron XVIII Low lets you channel the domineering force of LeBron on the court. Nike LeBron XVIII Low feature:  Woven materials in the upper provide a lightweight feel and durability. No-sew overlays offer structure and support. The padded collar protects the ankles. Light, padded tongue delivers comfort and breathability. External molded heel clip provides lightweight support and a locked-in feel. Rubber outsole with diamond cutouts offers durability and traction.

name: Converse Chuck 70 Hi
description: Soft as a cloud and cool as a classic, the Converse Chuck 70 Hi has all the makings of an iconic sneaker. These sneakers are designed with a bold iridescent colourway that adds a hit of cool vibes as the temperature soars. The Archival star ankle patch with a vintage license plate on the heel reps the brand, while the patent leather upper delivers a premium look and feel. Converse Chuck 70 Hi features:  The winged tongue gives you a comfortable fit. 35mm rubber taping makes you pop. OrthoLite insole ensures a soft feel. OrthoLife cushioning gives you a smooth ride. Thick rubber outsole ensures durability and delivers superior traction.

Reissued Reebok shoes with a heritage born on the hardwood, the Reebok Kamikaze Low lets you make all the shots with an eye-popping style. Reebok Kamikaze II Low features:  Synthetic leather upper with tumbled leather accents gives a clean and street-ready look.  Lace closure provides a snug and secure fit.  EVA midsole offers bouncy cushioning and comfort. Hexalite hexagonal cushioning gives flexibility and responsiveness.

description: From shooting straight threes to dropping beats in the studio, excel in everything you do with the adidas Originals Dame 7 Extply. Whether you are manoeuvring through crossovers or shuffling on the beats, the adidas Originals Dame 7 Extply lets you step up your game in style. adidas Originals Dame 7 Extply features:  Integrated lacing on the upper provides a snug fit. The lightweight midfoot system ensures ample support. Lightstrike foam midsole offers cushioning and responsiveness. Supergrip rubber outsole with custom computerized graphics provides traction.

name: Reebok Answer IV

The leather upper sets you up with superior comfort and premium style that goes a long way. Keeping you on the front foot, it features a lace up front with a distinct zip-up closure system. The heel pull tab ensures easy on and off so you can step out in style in no time. Reebok Answer IV features:  The midsole is built with a full-length DMX foam cushioning technology to give you a smooth ride. The rubber outsole is grippy and gives you a sure footing. The lightweight 3D Ultralite bottom keeps you comfortable. Iverson's mantra "Only the Strong Survive" is engraved into the outsole of the shoe to keep you inspired. The black and white imprint of his face is encircled at the heel giving you an authentic look.

name: PUMA Wild Rider
description: Take a walk on the wild side in the PUMA Wild Rider. Inspired by the movement and motion of city life, the design elements of these sneakers bring a fresh and bold dimension to your everyday rotation. Sporting a raw and edgy look that is pure street, the PUMA Wild Rider catches the eye of every true baller out there. PUMA Wild Rider features:  Full lace closure provides a snug and secure fit. PUMA Formstrip overlay at the sides adds a dash of style and brand rep. Terry towel lining offers breathability and comfort. IMEVA midsole provides lightweight cushioning and responsiveness. The rubber outsole delivers durability and traction.

name: PUMA Wild Rider
description: This one’s for the young who are always on the move! The PUMA Wild Rider mirrors the fast city life in its new and intricate design. This silhouette brings a whole new element of style to the Rider family with a collage of fresh layers of material and a raw, edgy look. Featuring a sleek and sharp nylon upper and a leather formstripe, these shoes take the people’s favourite one step further. Take the idea of motion to a new level with the PUMA Wild Rider.  PUMA Wild Rider features:  Nylon upper with suede overlays offers a fresh street-ready look. IMEVA midsole ensures superior cushioning and a lightweight feel. The rubber outsole delivers excellent traction and durability.

name: Nike Air Zoom G.T. Run
description: Maximize your performance with the Nike Air Zoom G.T. Run. Designed for players who can do it all, these on-court shoes feature a lightweight upper, stacked-up cushioning system, and multidirectional micro-grip that supports your erratic gameplay. Ultra-light and extra-supportive in key areas, these sneakers provide a snug and consistent feel that helps you maximize momentum and outlast your competition. These silhouettes feature a multilayered cushioning system with a React Foam sock liner right underneath your feet, followed by a Zoom Air unit that covers most of your forefoot. Resting over a full-length React Foam footbed and another Zoom Air unit in the forefoot, these shoes offer a smooth ride that feels like you are floating on air. Carefully crafted to help you dominate the hardwood, the Nike Air Zoom G.T. Run takes your game to new and unexpected levels. Nike Air Zoom G.T. Run features:  Two-layer mesh upper offers a breathable and broken-in feel. Lightweight material with haptic print details gives durability. Padded, mid-high collar provides comfort and support around the ankle without sacrificing agility. Foam tongue molds to the feet and elevates lace pressure. The heel pull tab enables easy on and off.  Nike React Foam in the midsole offers durability and responsiveness. A thin rubber outsole with curvy ridges gives multidirectional traction and flexibility. Cutaway design at the arch and perforated rubber reduces weight.

name: adidas D.O.N. Issue 3
description: Unleash beast mode on the court with the adidas D.O.N. Issue 3. Built for Donovan Mitchell’s explosive game style, these sneakers offer lightweight comfort and responsiveness that keeps you supported through your vertical jumps and slam dunks. Channeling the mind-over-matter mentality of the ‘Spida’ on the court, the adidas D.O.N. Issue 3 makes sure that nothing can keep you down on the hardwood adidas D.O.N. Issue 3 features:  TPU overlayed toe cap reduces internal foot movement and offers stability. Lightstrike midsole increases the cushioning underfoot and reduces cleat pressure. TPU insert adds lateral stability for dynamic cuts. Locked-down heel delivers a comfortably snug fit.

name: Crocs Classic Clog
description: Cool off with your Crocs on! The Crocs Classic Clog is a summer staple you cannot do without. The ventilation ports ensure your feet stay dry and comfortable by flushing out water and debris. It is easy to clean and keeps you looking crisp longer. Water-friendly and light, these Crocs are all about fun and games. Crocs Classic Clog features:   Pivoting heel straps deliver a secure fit Jibbitz charms let you personalise your style. The outsole ensures durability. Iconic Crocs comfort keeps you feeling relaxed. Flexibility ensures a natural fit.

name: Crocs Classic Slides
description: Classic comfort at your feet! The Crocs Classic Slides bring lightweight fun to your everyday wear. Featuring Croslite foam footbeds, these easy-to-clean slides deliver unbeatable comfort with each step. Whether you are chilling at home or having fun in the sun, these slides are just perfect for you. Customize your look with Jibbitz charms and take your casual style to a whole new level. Crocs Classic Slides features:  Lightweight materials make it fun to wear. Quick to dry and easy to clean. Classic Crocs design offers flexibility and 360-degree comfort.

name: Nike Space Hippie 04
description: Aim for the stars and beyond! Raw and futuristic, the Nike Space Hippie 04 is made with transformed waste. With at least 25% recycled material by weight, it is the lightest sneaker in the collection and leaves the lowest carbon footprint behind. The ‘Space Waste Yarn’ upper is made with salvaged plastic bottles, T-shirts, and yarn scraps and is about 75% of the recycled content by weight. Fusing Nike grind with a blend of foams, the Crater Foam midsole provides a cushioned stability and a distinct look. Nike Space Hippie 04 features:• The modified waffle outsole pays homage to the heritage Nike sneaker design.• Plush insoles made with recycled content provide comfort.• Woven-in yarn eyestays lend an unusual look to the lacing and lock your feet in.• The deconstructed design creates a raw, prototype vibe. • Pull tab on the heel for an easy fit.

name: Nike Blazer Mid 77
description: Celebrate 50 years of Swoosh with the Nike Blazer Mid 77. Iconic since June 18, 1971, these silhouettes harness the old-school look of B-ball to deliver a history lesson in style. Featuring luscious suede and double laces with a plush collar, the celebratory look of these sneakers mixes history with fashion to instantly spruce up your rotation. Flaunting stitched overlays, exposed needlework, removable lace aglet with diamond, and original Swoosh design from 1971 embroidered on the side, the Nike Blazer Mid 77 lets you step back in time. Nike Blazer Mid 77 features:  Mid-height, padded collar provides support and comfort. Extra set of laces provide a locked-in feel. Vulcanized construction fuses the outsole to the midsole for a streamlined look. Throwback tongue label with the original “Nike” script adds a pop of style and brand rep. Solid rubber outsole with herringbone pattern delivers traction, durability, and a vintage look.

description: Watch your boys make a splash on the court in the Jordan Point Lane. Inspired by three of MJ’s most memorable seasons, these mash-up sneakers pull in bits and pieces from the AJ3, AJ6, and AJ11 to create a silhouette that’s inspired by greatness and uncompromising comfort. The moulded heel cap and collar detail of these shoes draw from the AJ3, in which MJ scored the most points. Leather overlays reference the AJ11, in which he won his fourth ring. The sculpted midsole details, stitch lines, and moulded stretchy tongue are inspired by the AJ6 silhouettes, in which he won his first championship. The perfect trio of style, story, and support, the Jordan Point Lane lets your grade-schoolers rock the hardwood with their style. Jordan Point Lane features:  Perforation details provide breathability and comfort. Lace loops offer a secure and locked-in feel. High tongue gives flexibility and comfort. Lightweight, stable, and strong, the Jordan Zion 1 lets you take down the defenses like ‘Zanos’. Jordan Zion 1 features:  The dynamic and flexible tongue with targeted padding over the top eases lace pressure and provides plush comfort. The two-loop band with high sidewalls offers security and stability. Multidirectional outsole pattern delivers optimal traction and durability.

Made with sustainable and breathable knit materials, this ultra-flexible silhouette offers comfortable cushioning and responsiveness credit to its updated, laser-cut design. Optimized with strategically placed Flywire filaments for functional support and stability, the Free Run 5.0 keeps you composed and ready for more! Nike Free Run 5.0 '21 features:  A pull-tab at the heel ensures an easy on-and-off. Responsive foam midsole provides optimal energy return. Cushioned heel inspired from previous variants of the Free offer superior impact absorption Made with at least 20% recycled content by weight. Upper is made of at least 87% recycled material by weight.

name: Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit
description: The iconic, sustainable silhouette gets a ‘Max’ makeover! The Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit is made from at least 40% recycled materials and features extraordinary details with next-level versatility. With running roots and a stunning look, the revolutionary VaporMax 2 Air unit is crafted from recycled content and delivers supreme comfort. Stretchy and supportive, the Flyknit upper fuses post-industrial recycled yarn with an airy and seamless design for a modern, futuristic vibe. The recycled rubber on the sole adds a finishing touch to these cutting-edge, Earth-pro shoes. Add futuristic style to your rotation with the Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit. Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit features:  Soft collar sculpts your ankle for a snug fit. Padding on the heel enhances comfort. Plastic heel clip provides heritage styling. First one-piece Air unit to cover the entire length of a shoe allows smoother transitions and adds unbelievable cushioning. Nike Grind rubber detailing brings superior traction and durability.

name: Converse All Star HI
description: The original performance basketball sneaker.  Leather, suede, or textile upper materials add style and durability. Cupsole construction provides comfort and support underfoot. Classic rubber outsole supplies traction. This Shoe runs one size big. We suggest you order 1 size smaller than your normal shoe size for Men and 2 sizes smaller than your normal shoe size for Women. Wt. 14.8 oz.

description: A sweet treat for your feet! The exciting new team-up of PUMA and HARIBO rejuvenates one of the most iconic silhouettes – the PUMA RS-X3 with colourful and delicious details. Inspired by the classic HARIBO Goldbears, the gummy bears, and the original HARIBO packaging, these shoes explore the happy world of HARIBO with street-style design and a playful vibe. The stunning chunky upper features a mix of bright colours and plush materials for a stylish and breathable fit. Other details include a translucent TPU layer formstrip with stitching details, a HARIBO Goldbears hangtag, and a graphic print on the heel piece. You’re bound to make an impression when you step out repping the PUMA RS-X3.  The rubber midsole ensures superior cushioning and flexibility. The rubber outsole delivers excellent traction and durability.

Sporting a transparent mesh upper with soft suedes, these sneakers set your style standard so high you aren’t going to settle for anything lesser anymore. The seamless low-cut collar featuring soft edges gives this silhouette a classy look that feels comfortable. Do justice to your personal style with the Nike Waffle One. Nike Waffle One features:  Mixed upper provides durability and breathability and adds dimension and texture. Waffle-shaped dual-stacked midsole offers springy, soft, and superior cushioning. TPU heel clip adds support and an edgy DIY look. Iconic rubber waffle outsole with new moulded lugs enhances support, traction, and durability.

description: Modern meets classic in the thoughtfully crafted Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit. Made from at least 50% recycled material, its airy, easy-to-wear design features super stretchy, recycled FlyKnit on the upper. The stitched-on Swoosh and recycled TPU heel clip adds the perfect amount of flash as you float down the streets on incredibly soft VaporMax cushioning. Originally designed for running, the revolutionary VaporMax 2 Air unit is made from recycled material and provides more Air underfoot than ever before. The first 1-piece Air unit to run the entire length of a shoe allows for smoother transitions and adds unbelievable cushioning. Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit features:  The stretchy and supportive FlyKnit upper is made from post-industrial recycled yarn and creates a striking visual that's seamless, breathable, and feels as light as air. The traditional lacing adds ease-of-entry while webbing eyelets add a modern look. The seamless collar looks sleek and feels great while padding on the heel adds to the comfort. The recycled rubber on the sole adds durability and traction, putting a finishing touch on the shoe that lets you walk the talk. The Pinwheel logo and volt-coloured, recycled insole feels extra-cushy and signifies that the shoe contains at least 50% recycled materials by weight. The shoebox is made from recycled cardboard and doubles as a shipping box. Regrind rubber details deliver added traction and durability. TPU heel clip made from recycled plastics adds heritage styling.

name: Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit
description: Modern meets classic in the thoughtfully crafted Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit. Made from at least 50% recycled material, its airy, easy-to-wear design features super stretchy, recycled FlyKnit on the upper. The stitched-on Swoosh and recycled TPU heel clip adds the perfect amount of flash as you float down the streets on incredibly soft VaporMax cushioning. Originally designed for running, the revolutionary VaporMax 2 Air unit is made from recycled material and provides more Air underfoot than ever before. The first 1-piece Air unit to run the entire length of a shoe allows for smoother transitions and adds unbelievable cushioning. Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit features:  The stretchy and supportive FlyKnit upper is made from post-industrial recycled yarn and creates a striking visual that's seamless, breathable, and feels as light as air. The traditional lacing adds ease-of-entry while webbing eyelets add a modern look. The seamless collar looks sleek and feels great while padding on the heel adds to the comfort. The recycled rubber on the sole adds durability and traction, putting a finishing touch on the shoe that lets you walk the talk. The Pinwheel logo and volt-coloured, recycled insole feels extra-cushy and signifies that the shoe contains at least 50% recycled materials by weight. The shoebox is made from recycled cardboard and doubles as a shipping box. Regrind rubber details deliver added traction and durability. TPU heel clip made from recycled plastics adds heritage styling.

name: Reebok Kamikaze
description: First released in the mid '90s, the Reebok Kamikaze II is a retro take on one of their most iconic court shoes.  Durable leather and synthetic upper for a supportive fit. Padded insole to increase comfort. Dependable rubber outsole to deliver you traction once made for the court, now updated for streetwear. Wt. 14.3 oz.

name: PUMA Court Rider 2K
description: Unleash your beast mode on the court when you put on the PUMA Court Rider 2K. These shoes will feel like a second skin thanks to its lightweight textile upper construction. Rider foam around the midsole provides incredible cushioning so every step you take feels soft and natural. The PUMA Cat logo at the heel adds a bit of brand rep and that’s all you need to rock this look. The PUMA Court Rider 2K will keep you going for longer on and off the court. PUMA Court Rider 2K features:  Full lace closure brings in a secure fit. A translucent PUMA Formstrip at the sides offer a cool look. The sticky rubber outsole provides incredible traction.

name: Under Armour Curry 8
description: Take the court by storm in the Under Armour Curry 8. This single unit construction uses a variety of woven material to stay lightweight and breathable. Wired eyelets through the upper ensure the laces keep your feet are securely in place. Under Armour Curry 8 features:  Two pull tabs on the upper make the shoe easy to put on and take off. Lateral and medial reinforcement panels support the heel and midfoot. HOVR and Micro G from the Curry 7 ensure ample cushioning, flexibility, and responsiveness.

This revamp nods to the super-techy Air Max Plus of 1998 with its floating TPU cage, compression-molded upper and heel logo while revolutionary VaporMax Air technology brings it into today.  Revolutionary VaporMax Air technology to provide ultra-lightweight cushioning Floating, molded TPU cage to mimic the original 1998 design Compression-molded upper for durability Bootie construction to provide a snug fit Integrated lugs on the outsole to deliver aggressive traction Rubber pods in high-wear areas to enhance durability

name: Nike Air Max 90
description: An Icon Of Air The Men’s Nike Air Max 90 is truly one of the most iconic sneakers of all time. Released in a plethora of color combinations and materials throughout the years, the popular Air Max retro shoe can be found on the feet of connoisseurs across the globe, loved for its clean, timeless style and excellent comfort. The Air Max 90 was first released in 1990, and is yet another classic design by Nike’s design genius, Tinker Hatfield. Making a name for itself instantly when it debuted in the now-iconic “Infrared” colorway with the biggest visible Air bubble yet at the time, the model has transitioned from a high-performance runner packed with maximum Air to an essential casual sneaker found in the rotations of virtually every Air Max running shoe enthusiast new and old. If it’s a classically cool sneaker with all-day comfort you’re looking for, you can simply do no wrong with the Air Max 90. Unlimited StyleBeing one of the most popular sneakers on Earth, Nike Sportswear has — fortunately for all sneakerheads — made the Air Max 90 available in a wide variety of color combinations and material options. Traditionally available in its original construction of mesh and synthetic or natural leather, the Air Max 90 can also be found in a full range of premium materials from glossy patent leather, to wool-like textiles, to styles with all-over graphic prints. Colorways range from neutral to vibrant, assuring there is an Air Max 90 ready to match anybody’s personal style. Find your perfect pair of the iconic retro runner today here at Foot Locker, available in a full selection of men’s sizing and colors.• Mesh, leather, suede, and/or synthetic upper. See specific styles for materials.• Padded tongue and ankle collar for additional comfort.• Multiple eyestays for customizable lacing options.• Full-length foam midsole provides cushioning for all-day comfort.• Visible large Air Max unit in heel adds maximum cushioning and the model’s signature look.• Rubber outsole with waffle pattern ensures durable traction to prevent slippage.• Flex grooves within the outsole allow flexible movement of your foot, allowing for a natural range of motion.

name: Jordan Series .01
description: Wrap your feet in the might of Jordan! The Jordan Series .01 is a high-performance sneaker unfolding the story of how Jordan became the greatest of all time. “Dear Mike” on the tongue label and embroidered on the lateral side symbolises the letter Jordan wrote to his younger self remembering how his big-brother Larry taught him determination that he carried with him to greatness. Wearable on every occasion, these sneakers feature an outsole with circular traction inspired by the Air Jordan 1. The message moulded into the rubber reflects upon the backyard sports battles between Larry and Mike while the "45/2" nods to the number they both wore until they ended up on the same team. "SWING FOR THE FENCE" on the sock liner quotes a letter from Larry. This quote reflects Jordan’s attitude in life and specifically references the brothers' backyard battles. The Jordan Series .01 is the first vulcanised sneaker by Jordan Brand and just like a classic skate sneaker it has clean, high sidewalls that are double-wrapped around the toe for durability. Jordan Series .01 features:  Embroidered graphics add a pop of style. Smooth synthetic leather and rough suede play on texture enhancing the overall look of this silhouette. Woven tongue and label create a stylish look. Triangular cut-outs on the sides are filled with stretchy material to support wider feet with ease.

Nike Kyrie 7 features:  Mesh details on the upper offers breathability and helps you move quickly. The laces feed through molded fins that pull down over the forefoot while lacing up. Padded collar supports the Achilles tendon. Air Zoom Turbo unit makes it comfortable and gives responsive cushioning. Rubber outsole wrapped with the inner foot provides superior traction. Features “KI” logo on tongue, embroidered Kyrie signature on the heel, and inner tongue label.

name: Nike Air Max Plus
description: Making WavesThe Men’s Nike Air Max Plus is a certified icon of the Nike Air Max family. First released in 1998, the Air Max Plus was instantly notable for its then-new Tuned Air technology as well as the eye-catching design. The Air Max Plus debuted in ‘98 with graphic textile uppers in gradient colors that paired with the wavy TPU “stripes” that provided both support and even more flair. Most famous for its initial “Tiger” and “Shark” colorways, the silhouette has gone on to be featured in countless new colorways and materials in the years since. Along with the traditional mesh build, the Air Max Plus is available in premium leather and suede iterations, that add a new casual-minded lifestyle appeal to the original sporty design. No matter what the upper is constructed in, you’ll enjoy all day comfort thanks to the multiple visible Air units in the heel and forefoot.Big Air. Bold LooksIn 1998 the Air Max Plus helped introduce Nike’s new Tuned Air cushioning to the world, their iteration of Air Max technology that utilized specialized “pillars” incorporated into the Air units to offer extra support and stability for runners. The bold design eventually transcended its performance aspects, and the Air Max Plus quickly became the casual footwear of choice for the more daring sneaker connoisseurs across the globe who were instantly transfixed by its gradient-colored upper, wavy stripes, “whale tail” midfoot shank, and big Air bubbles. It all worked together to create a tech-filled sneaker icon brimming with distinct and unforgettable style.• Stretch synthetic upper provides breathability while injected TPU ribs add support, durability, and bold style.• Select styles are constructed in suede, leather, or synthetic materials. See each style for specific construction.• Graphic uppers and/or gradient TPU stripes on select styles.• Visible Air Max units in the forefoot and heel provide lightweight comfort.• Tuned Air® technology in the heel provides finely tuned support and cushioning.• Rubber outsole with waffle tread pattern offers traction and durability.

description: Strong, stylish, and sturdy! Experience the superhuman ability and humility of Zion with the Jordan Z-Code. Repping Zion’s spirit of duality, these signature silhouettes bring a sensational mix of plush underfoot comfort and premium performance. The energy-returning Zoom Air Unit stacked underneath the feet enables rapid responsiveness while you dart to get the ball into the hoop. Featuring a flexible and well-padded tongue that reduces lace pressure, these sneakers provide optimum comfort without added weight. Play to win with the Jordan Z-Code. Jordan Z-Code features:  2-loop bands offer a secure and snug fit. Higher sidewalls offer utmost side-to-side stability. Full-length Air Strobel Unit stitched directly to the upper provides premium cushioning. Multidirectional outsole pattern ensures superior traction.

name: Jordan Retro 7
description: Complete your look with retro style.  Leather and nubuck upper gives durability. Neoprene dynamic-fit inner sleeve adds comfort. Nylon web pull loop for easy on and off. Polyurethane footbed with phylon wrap for cushioning. Air-Sole units provide lightweight cushioning. Solid rubber outsole for durability. Pattern on outsole supplies traction.

name: PUMA RS Dreamer Mid
description: The RS Dreamer Mid “Off-Season Red”. A limited colorway inspired by the long-awaited “Off-Season” album by J. Cole. An album that was years in the making. This latest vision of the RS Dreamer Mid signals the strides the franchise is taking as a brand and service company with continued dedication to helping athletes and dreamers reach their highest levels without any sign of slowing down. Featuring a fiery red and black colorway as well as the latest RS technology, this new mid-top silhouette takes another step further for DREAMER into the world of on-court performance and off-court style. From a journey that was a lifetime in the making.

Full rubber outsole provides grip, traction, and stability. Full lace closure provides snug fit. Padded mesh tongue provides extra comfort.

At the 30th anniversary of the PUMA Disc System, these kicks embrace one of the most advanced systems. With the design details from the double-disc and original disc silhouettes, the Disc Rebirth integrates PUMA’s disc technology with top performance materials and foams to bring the disc back on the court. PUMA Disc Rebirth features:  CPU strap from the forefoot to the medial midfoot keeps you locked-in. PUMA disc system alternative closure helps the foot and ankle stay in place. Full-length ProFoam midsole, PUMA’s proprietary High rebound EVA provide lightweight rebound and energy return. The full coverage rubber outsole with PUMA’s high abrasion, sticky rubber compound ensures durability and traction.

name: Nike Air Total Max Uptempo
description: The second coming of a LEGEND! Released in the era of high-flying hoops - the ‘90s, the Nike Air Total Max Uptempo stole the show whether on the court or the streets. Revamped with modern technology, the iconic design nods to the on-court style and basketball culture. Join in on the next wave of comfort and style with a classic that features premium leather upper, chrome heel plate, vibrant colors, and a retro feel. Nike Air Total Max Uptempo features:  Premium leather, synthetic leather, and mesh upper makes it lightweight and brings durability. Air Max unit in the sole gives lightweight responsive cushion. Mesh tongue and collar lining offers breathability. Elastic gores provide a secure fit. The chrome heel plate and vibrant color bursts eye-catching details nod to the original and allow a retro feel. Patent synthetic leather trim adds shine and contrast to show off the rippling design lines. Heel pull and embroidered Swoosh on the medial toe gives it a signature look.

name: adidas Originals NMD R1
description: Eye-Catching adidas OriginalsKnown for both style and comfort, adidas provides an incredible adaption of the styling of three past shoe stars. The adidas Originals NMD R1 combines the unique silhouette of the Micropacer, Boston Super, and Rising Star into a whole new fusion. This masterpiece offers extreme comfort paired with the eye-catching style you have come to know and love from the adidas brand.NMDs for EverydayWhether you are out for a casual stroll or you are heading to the big game, adidas Originals NMD R1s are the perfect pair of kicks to sport any day of the week. With a snug and comfortable fit, these unique shoes are designed with high-quality components that provide support and extreme cushioning. With EVA plugs embedded in the soles, these shoes are more than just a good time. Their flexible but snug fit makes them a go-to shoe for any daily activity.adidas Originals NMD R1 features:• Primeknit, adaptive knit, and mesh allow you to customize the look and feel of your shoes.• NMD branded pull tab makes slipping these shoes on and off a cinch.• Adaptive fit provides ultimate comfort on the go.• Full-length Boost midsole and EVA plugs embedded in the sole provide comfort for daily use.• Three different patterns on the rubber outsole allow for varying grip as needed. • Hexagonal patches and grooves on the outsole provide flexibility and unique style.

name: Nike LeBron XVIII
description: DESIGNED FOR A KING. Designed specifically for LeBron, Nike Basketball's largest heel Max Air unit to date absorbs more force than previous designs. Visible, maximum-volume Zoom Air units under the ball of the foot provide quick, continuous responsiveness to generate fast-paced action. ONE OF KIND DETAIL. KnitPosite is a combination of Flyknit construction and pre-twisted, heat-molded yarns that form swirled patterns. The result is light, durable and supportive, with each shoe having a look that's subtly one-of-a-kind.  Soft foam pod directly under the Max Air unit adds cushioning in the heel. Stabilizing plastic clip wraps around heel to lock you in.

OrthoLite footbed provides targeted, breathable cushioning. The rubber sole offers optimized grip, durability, and a lightweight feel.

Clarks fuses traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design to deliver enhanced, unrivalled comfort for all-day wear. This boot features an OrthoLite footbed with gait mapping technology and a crepe-effect natural rubber sole finished in premium suede. With 100% recycled shoelaces and a translucent fabric on the toe dazzling with vibrant materials, the Nike Crater Impact is the “shoe-stopper” you simply must add to your sports rotation. description: Redefine your limits with the Jordan AJ 11 Comfort Low. Drawing inspiration from the famous Air Jordan 11, these low-top mash-up shoes use a combination of sculpted Cushlon foam and springy Zoom Air cushioning to give you a smooth ride wherever you go. Featuring patent leather in the upper that gives these silhouettes a glossy look similar to the AJ11, the Jordan AJ 11 Comfort Low lets you get comfy in your heritage. Jordan AJ 11 Comfort Low features:  Patent and synthetic leather and textile in the upper give a sleek and premium look. The comfort collar protects the ankles. Webbing lace loops offer a snug and locked-in feel. Cushlon foam midsole and Zoom Air unit in the forefoot provide bouncy cushioning and comfort. Rubber outsole sections give optimal traction and durability.

name: Jordan Pro Strong
description: Celebrate the Jordan Pro Strong's 20th anniversary. This premium shoe is designed for comfort and durability.  Leather and synthetic upper is made for durability and support. Hidden gillie lacing provides a sleek look. Compression-molded Phylon is made for comfort and cushioning underfoot. Rubber outsole is durable and offers long-lasting wear.

Crafted with a mix of suede, full-grain leather, and various textiles, it’s designed to stand out anywhere. Jordan MA2 features:  Suede eyestays and toe cap offer a classic, premium look. Perforated foam sock liner, collar, and tongue offer comfort from every angle. Sculpted foam sole provides optimal energy return with every stride. The offset tongue pull loop lets you secure your fit to avoid unnecessary slippage. A translucent pull loop along the sides ensures a firm, locked-in fit. name: adidas NMD R1 V2
description: Keep that urban nomad spirit alive in the adidas Originals NMD_R1 V2. This run-inspired shoe blends street style with tech detailing for a truly progressive design. EVA inserts and high-tech boost in the midsole give you a comfortable step-in feel. Tech stretch mesh upper has welded TPU details and 3-Stripes.  Rubber outsole gives you durable traction.

name: Jordan Max Aura 2
description: Inspired by a legacy at play, the Jordan Max Aura 2 draws from Michael Jordan's rich history of performance basketball shoes. The design takes cues from past Air Jordans with lightweight cushioning and a look that's money on the street.  Leather upper with wraparound mud guard and heel overlay provides durability and support. Visible Air under your heel. Visible Max Air unit supplies lightweight cushioning and comfort beneath your heel. Leather, synthetic leather and textile materials in upper Rubber outsole with a herringbone pattern provides traction.

name: Jordan AJ 1 Take 2
description: Get your no-fuss fit with the Russ Westbrook inspired Jordan AJ 1 Take 2. Featuring a top-notch design that enables superior agility and speed, this modern silhouette keeps you sharp on the court even late into games. Rep Beastbrook’s moves in style with the exceptionally athletic AJ 1 Take 2 from Jordan! Jordan AJ 1 Take 2 features:  Lightweight upper offers optimal breathability and protection. Zoom Air units offer superior cushioning and ease in rear to forefoot transitions. Heel pull made with lace material secures your feet for a locked-in fit. Rubber outsole with multi-directional herringbone traction provides a durable grip.

name: Nike Air Max Plus
description: Making WavesThe Men’s Nike Air Max Plus is a certified icon of the Nike Air Max family. First released in 1998, the Air Max Plus was instantly notable for its then-new Tuned Air technology as well as the eye-catching design. The Air Max Plus debuted in ‘98 with graphic textile uppers in gradient colors that paired with the wavy TPU “stripes” that provided both support and even more flair. Most famous for its initial “Tiger” and “Shark” colorways, the silhouette has gone on to be featured in countless new colorways and materials in the years since. Along with the traditional mesh build, the Air Max Plus is available in premium leather and suede iterations, that add a new casual-minded lifestyle appeal to the original sporty design. No matter what the upper is constructed in, you’ll enjoy all day comfort thanks to the multiple visible Air units in the heel and forefoot.Big Air. Bold LooksIn 1998 the Air Max Plus helped introduce Nike’s new Tuned Air cushioning to the world, their iteration of Air Max technology that utilized specialized “pillars” incorporated into the Air units to offer extra support and stability for runners. The bold design eventually transcended its performance aspects, and the Air Max Plus quickly became the casual footwear of choice for the more daring sneaker connoisseurs across the globe who were instantly transfixed by its gradient-colored upper, wavy stripes, “whale tail” midfoot shank, and big Air bubbles. It all worked together to create a tech-filled sneaker icon brimming with distinct and unforgettable style.• Stretch synthetic upper provides breathability while injected TPU ribs add support, durability, and bold style.• Select styles are constructed in suede, leather, or synthetic materials. See each style for specific construction.• Graphic uppers and/or gradient TPU stripes on select styles.• Visible Air Max units in the forefoot and heel provide lightweight comfort.• Tuned Air® technology in the heel provides finely tuned support and cushioning.• Rubber outsole with waffle tread pattern offers traction and durability.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8
description: The coveted silhouette of ’82 gets an all-opaque sole update! The Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8 flaunts a natural-cream coloured upper accented by coloured threads. Featuring a smooth leather construction all-over, this Nike sneaker utilises contrast stitching to highlight different features. A bright red tone is used to accentuate the branding at the barely see-through tooling below, the embroidery of the heel tab behind, the tongue tab spaces above, and the Swoosh on the upper. The lace and dubrae in white and silver follow the simplicity of the colour scheme while the dark blues adds contrast to the inner lining and tongue. Nike Air Force 1 '07 LV8 features:  The stitched overlays on the upper add heritage style, durability, and support. The perforations on the upper offer breathability. The padded, low-cut collar looks sleek and feels soft.

name: adidas Forum Low
description: Add some retro love to your closet with the adidas Forum Low. Hitting the scene in 1984 and gaining major love on the hardwood and in the music biz, these silhouettes add the ‘80s attitude to your style quotient. Channeling explosive hardwood energy in these B-ball status shoes in low top form, the adidas Forum Low lets you make a statement on the streets with your style.  Leather upper offers a clean and sleek look. The rubber outsole provides durability and optimal traction.

name: Nike Air Max 90 SE
description: Double down on that heritage Nike style with the immaculate Air Max 90 SE. Stylised with an embroidered botanical illustration, its vibrant and OG design nods to the plant dye used in the making. Crafted for superior performance running and an exceptionally iconic ‘90s look, the Nike Air Max 90 SE brings a vintage flex to your activewear rotation! Nike Air Max 90 SE features:  Low-top, padded collar ensures a sleek, streamlined look. Upper includes a recycled canvas construction. Recycled laces ensure a sustainable and locked-down fit. Stitched overlays and TPU accents provide optimal durability and comfort. Hints of cork in the Swoosh design and heel update your overall style. Stitched overlays with 100% recycled denim and an embroidered plant graphic add to the sustainable style. Recycled EVA foam insole provide responsive, all-day comfort and cushioning. The foam midsole ensures maximum energy return with every stride. Mixed cork and rubber Waffle outsole provide superior grip and traction at high-abrasion zones. Made with at least 20% recycled content by weight; includes 9% cork in the Waffle outsole.

name: Nike Air Max 90 SE
description: Double down on that heritage Nike style with the immaculate Air Max 90 SE.
