name: Nike Air Force 1 LV8
description: Retro basketball kicks remixed for modern everyday wear.  Leather upper for a comfortable fit and premium look. Full-length Air-Sole unit for iconic cushioning with every step. Rubber outsole for durable traction on any surface.

name: adidas Originals NMD R1
description: Eye-Catching adidas OriginalsKnown for both style and comfort, adidas provides an incredible adaption of the styling of three past shoe stars. The adidas Originals NMD R1 combines the unique silhouette of the Micropacer, Boston Super, and Rising Star into a whole new fusion. This masterpiece offers extreme comfort paired with the eye-catching style you have come to know and love from the adidas brand.NMDs for EverydayWhether you are out for a casual stroll or you are heading to the big game, adidas Originals NMD R1s are the perfect pair of kicks to sport any day of the week. With a snug and comfortable fit, these unique shoes are designed with high-quality components that provide support and extreme cushioning. With EVA plugs embedded in the soles, these shoes are more than just a good time. Their flexible but snug fit makes them a go-to shoe for any daily activity.adidas Originals NMD R1 features:• Primeknit, adaptive knit, and mesh allow you to customize the look and feel of your shoes.• NMD branded pull tab makes slipping these shoes on and off a cinch.• Adaptive fit provides ultimate comfort on the go.• Full-length Boost midsole and EVA plugs embedded in the sole provide comfort for daily use.• Three different patterns on the rubber outsole allow for varying grip as needed. • Hexagonal patches and grooves on the outsole provide flexibility and unique style.

name: Kappa Banda Aster Slides
description: The next evolution of summer slides is here with the Kappa Banda Aster Slides. Its easy slip-on style coupled with luxe nylon upper makes it a fierce fashion choice. The straps deliver a secure fit while the Banda with Omini logo on the footbed keeps it stylishly Kappa!  The PVC outsole offers traction. The Banda with Omini logo repetition on the upper adds signature style.

name: Jordan Zion 1
description: Strong, stylish, and sturdy! Experience the superhuman ability and humility of Zion with the Jordan Z-Code. Repping Zion’s spirit of duality, these signature silhouettes bring a sensational mix of plush underfoot comfort and premium performance. The energy-returning Zoom Air Unit stacked underneath the feet enables rapid responsiveness while you dart to get the ball into the hoop. Featuring a flexible and well-padded tongue that reduces lace pressure, these sneakers provide optimum comfort without added weight. Play to win with the Jordan Z-Code. Jordan Z-Code features:  2-loop bands offer a secure and snug fit. Higher sidewalls offer utmost side-to-side stability. Full-length Air Strobel Unit stitched directly to the upper provides premium cushioning. Multidirectional outsole pattern ensures superior traction.

name: Reebok Classic Leather Legacy
description: Hit peak performance with the Reebok Classic Leather Legacy. Made with a textile and nubuck upper, soft terry lining, and sockliner, this shoe is all about comfort and stability.  Reflective piping keeps you visible in low light conditions. Die-cut EVA midsole provides soft cushioning. Imported.

name: Crocs Classic Clog
description: Slip into the Crocs Classic Clog, the iconic sandals that started a comfort revolution around the world! The irreverent go-to comfort shoe that you’re sure to fall deeper in love with day after day. Crocs Classic Clogs offer lightweight Iconic Crocs Comfort, a colour for every personality, and an ongoing invitation to be comfortable in your own shoes. Crocs Classic Clog features:  Water-friendly and buoyant, making it the perfect pair for a day at the beach. Ventilation ports add breathability and help shed water and debris. Pivoting heel straps creates a more secure fit. Customisable with Jibbitz charms so you can personalize your look.

name: PUMA Court Rider Melo
description: Keep it at 100 with the PUMA Court Rider Melo. Drawing inspiration from the Future Rider and extending the energy further onto the hardwood, these shoes are designed to push the culture of hoops and the street forward in a positive direction. Riding on a full-length Rider foam engineered to maximize your performance on the court, these sneakers support your feet through intense manoeuvres and high-impact vertical jumps. Engineered to change the narrative of the sports, the PUMA Court Rider Melo lets you steal the game like LaMelo.  The lacing system around the forefoot offers a locked-in and secure feel. Full coverage rubber outsole with PUMA’s high abrasion, sticky rubber compound provides enhanced durability and traction.

name: Nike Waffle One
description: Back with a blast! The new and fresh Nike Waffle One blends the best of Nike with revolutionary technology. Sporting a transparent mesh upper with soft suedes, these sneakers set your style standard so high you aren’t going to settle for anything lesser anymore. The seamless low-cut collar featuring soft edges gives this silhouette a classy look that feels comfortable. Do justice to your personal style with the Nike Waffle One. Nike Waffle One features:  Mixed upper provides durability and breathability and adds dimension and texture. Waffle-shaped dual-stacked midsole offers springy, soft, and superior cushioning. TPU heel clip adds support and an edgy DIY look. Iconic rubber waffle outsole with new moulded lugs enhances support, traction, and durability.

name: Vans Slip On
description: Legendary shoes in a new avatar! The Vans Slip On is ready to push the limits of effortless style with a distorted DIY, cut-and-paste treatment. Featuring exposed materials and irregular techniques, these slip-ons use a low profile design, suede and canvas upper, and laces for a deconstructed, inside-out feel. Other details like the eye-catching print, padded collar, elastic side accents, and signature rubber Waffle outsole offer a comfortable and stylish finish.  Vulcanized midsole enhances comfort and durability. Rubber outsole delivers excellent traction and grip.

name: Vans Old Skool
description: AYE AYE CAPTAIN!  Dive undersea for a F.U.N. collaboration with Vans and SpongeBob SquarePants, the world’s most memorable sponge. To help you show your love for the coolest creatures under the sea, the Vans x SpongeBob Old Skool combines our iconic sidestripe shoe with a checkerboard pattern featuring silly cameos from SpongeBob himself, along with yellow sidestripes that tie into his recognizable look. Made with durable suede and textile uppers, this low top style maintains its classic appeal while adding in a little extra nautical nonsense. The Vans x SpongeBob Old Skool also includes re-enforced toe caps, supportive padded collars, and signature rubber waffle outsoles. VANS Old Skool features:  Vans x SpongeBob collection. A partial checkerboard and SpongeBob print. Yellow sidestripes and sidewall details. Durable suede and textile uppers. Re-enforced toe caps. Supportive padded collars. Signature rubber waffle outsoles.

Signature rubber waffle outsoles.

name: Vans SK8 Low
description: Flip, turn, and rock! A takedown of the legendary Vans high top skate shoe, the Sk8-Low is built with an array of colors and materials to provide a familiar Sk8-Hi aesthetic in a low top shoe. Featuring sturdy canvas and suede uppers with the iconic Vans checkerboard print, the Canvas/Suede Sk8-Low also includes re-enforced toecaps to withstand repeated wear, padded collars for support and flexibility, and signature rubber waffle outsoles.  Sturdy canvas upper offers a signature Vans sk8er look. The signature waffle outsole helps you deliver optimal traction and support.

name: Reebok Club C Crest
description: Premium leather with an embroidered crest! Originally created for the tennis court, the Club C classic silhouette gets a royal update with the Reebok Club C Crest. Distinguished by the hits of colour at the heel and the embroidered crest logo, this Club C pair offers maximum comfort with vintage aesthetics. Reebok Club C Crest features:  Soft leather upper offers maximum comfort. Lightweight, die-cut EVA midsole absorbs impact and protects the feet. A padded foam sock liner provides cushioning. Full rubber midsole and outsole offers durable traction. Union Jack label under heel tab and Reebok crest logo reps the brand. Lace closure offers a personalised fit.

name: New Balance BB 480
description: Step out and explore new places in the New Balance BB 480. Featuring an Ortholite cushion insert, these silhouettes keep you comfortable and relaxed throughout the day. Sporting authentic basketball detailing inspired by game-worn models, the New Balance BB 480 attracts the attention of every true baller on the streets. New Balance BB 480 features:  Rugged leather construction provides exceptional durability and unmatched comfort. Extended saddle and sturdy heel offer support and moisture control. Durable rubber cup outsole delivers traction and durability.

name: PUMA Disc Rebirth
description: Witness the ‘Rebirth’! Celebrate the coming together of Motorsport and basketball culture in the PUMA Disc Rebirth. At the 30th anniversary of the PUMA Disc System, these kicks embrace one of the most advanced systems. With the design details from the double-disc and original disc silhouettes, the Disc Rebirth integrates PUMA’s disc technology with top performance materials and foams to bring the disc back on the court. PUMA Disc Rebirth features:  CPU strap from the forefoot to the medial midfoot keeps you locked-in. PUMA disc system alternative closure helps the foot and ankle stay in place. Full-length ProFoam midsole, PUMA’s proprietary High rebound EVA provide lightweight rebound and energy return. The full coverage rubber outsole with PUMA’s high abrasion, sticky rubber compound ensures durability and traction.

name: New Balance Two Way
description: The New Balance Two Way is a techy B-ball sneaker that’s built for the most versatile two-way players. Its FuelCell midsole keeps your feet cushioned to perfection, while offering a propulsive feel. Speed up as you shoot hoops with the precise support these silhouettes offer. Thoughtful design helps maximize performance, while features like a mid-collar and midsole shank offer a fresh game-day feel. Pair up these kicks with your favorite B-ball outfit and slay the competition with style. New Balance Two Way features:  Synthetic upper with no-sew overlays ensure added support and durability. Kinetic stitch construction brings support and flexibility. No-sew tongue tip enables premium comfort. Lace-up closure offers a locked-in feel. Mid-collar provides ankle stability. Ortholite sock liner delivers responsive comfort. Data-driven outsole ensures superior traction.

name: New Balance Two Way
description: The New Balance Two Way is a techy B-ball sneaker that’s built for the most versatile two-way players. name: adidas Ultraboost DNA
description: The adidas Ultraboost DNA definitely lives up to the hype by infusing the latest style and meeting the performance-boosting standards. The Primeknit forefoot keeps your foot in place while the midsole packs a full-length boost returns energy with each step making it a reliable favourite for all runners. adidas Ultraboost DNA features:  The rubber outsole lets you tread comfortably. The external butterfly heel counter hugs your feet. The four-way stretch heel feels like a second skin.

name: Nike Daybreak Type
description: Bill Bowerman’s early ‘70s prototypes get a fresh look. Style up with the Nike Daybreak Type.  Mesh upper for cool breathability. Suede and leather upper for durability and comfort. Plastic heel and toe pieces for a supportive fit. Rubber waffle sole delivers traction and durability. N354 detail stitched on tongue label and heel.

name: Nike Air Presto
description: Suit up with the Nike Air Presto and watch magic happen.  Breathable mesh for comfort and ventilation. Low-top silhouette. Synthetic lacing component.  Rubber toe cap.

name: Nike Air Vapormax Evo
description: Step into a whole new world in the Nike Air Vapormax Evo shoes. Taking elements from generations of Air Max, the Evo merges history and innovation to bring your feet the best. Its lightweight, breathable structure makes you feel like you’re walking on air. With unbelievably responsive cushioning, the Nike Air Vapormax Evo keeps you agile and ever-ready. Nike Air Vapormax Evo features:  Synthetic and mesh upper offers coverage and ventilation. VaporMax Air unit offers full-foot cushioning. Foam midsole provides responsiveness and comfort. Pull tab on heel helps secure your foot to avoid unnecessary slippage. Rubber pods on the outsole provide traction and durability.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Introducing the first-ever Max Air unit designed specifically for Nike Sportswear, the Nike Air Max 270 delivers visible air and unbelievable comfort under every step. It has callbacks to the original 1991 Air Max 180 on its exaggerated tongue top and heritage tongue logo while also being upgraded for modern comfort.  Large volume Max Air unit delivers responsive cushioning. Neoprene stretch bootie construction offers a snug fit. 3-piece midsole offers durability and a smooth transition. Mono-mesh window in the quarter and engineered mesh in the forefoot provide durability. Rubber toe tip offers durability in high-wear areas. Design lines, tongue logo, and exaggerated tongue top nod to the original Air Max 180 of 1991.

name: PUMA Clyde All Pro
description: The Clyde model provides the foundation for all of PUMA Hoops. With the Clyde All-Pro, PUMA is taking the shoe's on-court performance and street-ready style to the next level.  Matryx engineered lightweight upper makes this the fastest and most lightweight Clyde yet. Full-length ProFoam+ midsole provides lightweight cushioning and energy return. Full rubber outsole provides grip, traction, and stability. Full lace closure provides snug fit. Padded mesh tongue provides extra comfort.

name: PUMA RS Dreamer
description: For the innovators and the dreamers, the PUMA RS-X Dreamer is the modern silhouette you need in your rotation.  Dynamic lacing system offers a firm, locked-in. Mesh upper with leather and suede overlays offers cool comfort and durability. Molded sockliner feels soft and comfortable underfoot. Full-length profoam midsole offers superior responsiveness and energy return. Sticky rubber and engineered traction pattern provides incredible grip and traction.

name: Reebok Question Mid
description: Gear up with classic signature kicks. The Reebok Question Mid features an iconic design from upper to outsole for a look that throws it all the way back to the early 2000s.  Durable nubuck upper. Classic Hexalite™ midsole cushioning for all-day comfort. Debossed Vector logo on sides, tongue, and outsole. Rubber outsole for traction and durability.

name: Nike Zoom Freak 2
description: With unbeatable skill, size, and speed, Giannis is a force to be reckoned with. Harness his power and fly up and down the court in the lightweight, energy-returning Zoom Freak 2. With Zoom Air technology and lightweight foam, you'll have explosive power and energy return in every step.  Unique design draws inspiration from Giannis' family and heritage. Zoom Air technology provides explosive launching and stepping power. Large Nike Swoosh and Giannis imagery cover shoe.

name: adidas Originals Superstar
description: Forever IconicThe adidas Originals Superstar is, without a doubt, one of the most iconic and important sneakers of all time. First debuting in 1969 as an on-court performance basketball shoe, the Superstar has transcended sport to become one of the most-worn casual sneakers ever, loved throughout the world by generations of sneaker aficionados. The historic low-top silhouette flaunts a timeless look with its iconic 3-Stripes branding and rubber toe cap. The signature toe piece was first designed for extra protection on the court, but is now an iconic and instantly recognizable design cue in sneaker and fashion cultures. The Superstar is built with a leather, synthetic, and/or textile upper with its cupsole and toe cap in rubber. It’s all finished off with classic adidas trefoil branding on the tongue and heel.An Absolute EssentialAs one of the most popular sneakers ever created, you can bet that adidas Originals supplies plenty of color and material options for the Superstar. The model is most iconic in its traditional two-tone colorblocks of white with black accents and vice versa, but you can also find it in options from neutral to multicolor. Materials range from a traditional leather build to suede or textile uppers, to metallic finishes just to name a few. Find the perfect Superstar to match your own vibe here at Foot Locker today.adidas Originals Superstar Features:• Leather, synthetic, and/or textile upper.• Classic 3-Stripes branding on each side of shoe at the midfoot.• Signature rubber toe cap for style and durability.• Mesh lining for breathability and comfort.• Padded heel collar for plush feel.• adidas Trefoil branding on tongue and heel.• “Superstar” branding on lateral sides.• Rubber cupsole with herringbone tread pattern for durability and traction.

name: Vans Classic Slip On
description: Originally known as the #98, Vans Classic Slip-Ons became a staple for skaters and BMX riders shortly after their release in 1977. Vans had already taken off in Southern Cali, so the new, easy-to-wear silhouette was welcomed. In 1982, Classic Slip-Ons made their film debut, earning Vans even more attention nationally and internationally. The black and white checkered Slip Ons in particular have become an instantly recognizable look from Vans.  Durable canvas upper provides a clean space for a multitude of patterns, prints, and styles. Slip-on design makes this shoe a favorite for skate or casual wear. Off the Wall outsole is made of durable, grippy gum rubber for reliable traction. Vulcanized construction reduces weight and increases flexibility for all-day comfort. Padded collar gives a better fit around the ankle to reduce chafing. Cushioned footbed helps absorb shock with each footfall. Die-cut EVA insert adds support underfoot along with extra cushioning for long days on your feet. Cotton drill lining feels smooth and soft and allows airflow to keep feet dry and comfortable.

name: adidas NMD R1 V2
description: Keep that urban nomad spirit alive in the adidas Originals NMD_R1 V2. This run-inspired shoe blends street style with tech detailing for a truly progressive design. EVA inserts and high-tech boost in the midsole give you a comfortable step-in feel. Tech stretch mesh upper has welded TPU details and 3-Stripes.  Rubber outsole gives you durable traction.

name: adidas NMD R1 V2
description: Keep that urban nomad spirit alive in the adidas Originals NMD_R1 V2. This run-inspired shoe blends street style with tech detailing for a truly progressive design. EVA inserts and high-tech boost in the midsole give you a comfortable step-in feel. Tech stretch mesh upper has welded TPU details and 3-Stripes.  Rubber outsole gives you durable traction.

name: Nike Air Total Max Uptempo
description: The second coming of a LEGEND! Released in the era of high-flying hoops - the ‘90s, the Nike Air Total Max Uptempo stole the show whether on the court or the streets. Revamped with modern technology, the iconic design nods to the on-court style and basketball culture. Join in on the next wave of comfort and style with a classic that features premium leather upper, chrome heel plate, vibrant colors, and a retro feel. description: Put on classic style by Converse.  Leather upper for durability and style. Lunarlon cushioning for all-day comfort. Rubber outsole for durability and traction.

name: Nike KD 14
description: Slice through the defense like Kevin Durant in the Nike KD 14. The lightweight multilayer mesh upper offers a locked-in fit and a broken-in feel, for total comfort on the court. With a full-length Zoom Air Strobel unit, it’s soft and responsive, for an optimal energy return. The Nike KD 14 helps maintain your stamina and takes your game to the next level. Nike KD 14 features:  Hook-and-loop strap over the laces offers a secure, supportive fit. Strap takes inspiration from the shape of the grim reaper’s scythe. Cushlon foam sock liner offers a soft, responsive sensation. Rubber outsole provides tuned traction and durability.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor 70 Hi
description: An Original, Re-Crafted The Converse Canada Chuck 70 High Top Shoe is an original, revamped. Classically designed, the shoe icomes complete with contrast stitch detailing and laces, a thick rubber outsole, and a vintage All Star ankle patch. The updated shoe also includes a thicker, more durable canvas upper, an Ortholite midsole, and a super-reinforced toe cap. Converse Canada Chuck 70 High Top Shoe Features: • Durable, organic canvas upper is sturdy and reliable.• Ortholite™ cushioned midsole provides superior, all day comfort.• Thicker rubber outsole includes multiple textures for traction.• Reinforced toe cap stands up to wear and tear.

name: Converse Pro Leather
description: Put on classic style by Converse.  Leather upper for durability and style. Lunarlon cushioning for all-day comfort. Rubber outsole for durability and traction.

name: Jordan MA2
description: The Jordan MA2 redefines sneakers with a mix of modern innovation and classic style. An Air Max 200 unit in the sole delivers unique support and unparalleled day-to-day comfort. A new foot-to-foot eject system with an elevated heel and tall ergonomic tongue makes it easy to slide on and off. Crafted with a mix of suede, full-grain leather, and various textiles, it’s designed to stand out anywhere. Jordan MA2 features:  Suede eyestays and toe cap offer a classic, premium look. Perforated foam sock liner, collar, and tongue offer comfort from every angle. Sculpted foam sole provides optimal energy return with every stride. The offset tongue pull loop lets you secure your fit to avoid unnecessary slippage. A translucent pull loop along the sides ensures a firm, locked-in fit. Pull loops on the tongue and side enable convenient wear and removal.

availability.name: Jordan Zion 1
availability.description: Be an unmatched force of athleticism and speed on the hardwood in the Jordan Zion 1. Featuring a design inspired by the duality of Zion’s superhuman ability and humility, these sneakers let you rule the court with confidence. The full-length Air Strobel unit stacked with a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot gives you plush cushioning and rapid responsiveness with each step. Lightweight, stable, and strong, the Jordan Zion 1 lets you take down the defenses like ‘Zanos’. Jordan Zion 1 features:  The dynamic and flexible tongue with targeted padding over the top eases lace pressure and provides plush comfort. The two-loop band with high sidewalls offers security and stability. Multidirectional outsole pattern delivers optimal traction and durability.

availability.name: Jordan Point Lane
availability.description: Pose a triple threat on the court with the Jordan Point Lane. Inspired by three of MJ’s most memorable seasons, these mash-up sneakers pull in bits and pieces from the AJ3, AJ6, and AJ11 to create a silhouette that’s inspired by greatness and uncompromising comfort. The moulded heel cap and collar detail of these shoes draw from the AJ3, in which MJ scored the most points. Leather overlays reference the AJ11, in which he won his fourth ring. The sculpted midsole details, stitch lines, and moulded stretchy tongue are inspired by the AJ6, silhouettes in which he won his first championship. The perfect trio of style, story, and support, the Jordan Point Lane lets you rock the hardwood with your style. Jordan Point Lane features:  Leather overlays offer a sleek and premium look. Perforation details enable breathability and comfort. Lace loops ensure a locked-in and secure feel. A high tongue gives flexibility and comfort. Moulded heel cap provides heightened heel support. Air Max 200 unit under the heel offers lightweight cushioning.

availability.name: Nike Free Run 5.0 '21
availability.description: Add serious pace to your running progress with the Nike Free Run 5.0 ’21. Made with sustainable and breathable knit materials, this ultra-flexible silhouette offers comfortable cushioning and responsiveness credit to its updated, laser-cut design. Optimized with strategically placed Flywire filaments for functional support and stability, the Free Run 5.0 keeps you composed and ready for more! Nike Free Run 5.0 '21 features:  A pull-tab at the heel ensures an easy on-and-off. Responsive foam midsole provides optimal energy return. Cushioned heel inspired from previous variants of the Free offer superior impact absorption Made with at least 20% recycled content by weight. Upper is made of at least 87% recycled material by weight.

availability.name: Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit
availability.description: The iconic, sustainable silhouette gets a ‘Max’ makeover! The Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit is made from at least 40% recycled materials and features extraordinary details with next-level versatility. With running roots and a stunning look, the revolutionary VaporMax 2 Air unit is crafted from recycled content and delivers supreme comfort. Stretchy and supportive, the Flyknit upper fuses post-industrial recycled yarn with an airy and seamless design for a modern, futuristic vibe. The recycled rubber on the sole adds a finishing touch to these cutting-edge, Earth-pro shoes. Add futuristic style to your rotation with the Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit. Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit features:  Soft collar sculpts your ankle for a snug fit. Padding on the heel enhances comfort. Plastic heel clip provides heritage styling. First one-piece Air unit to cover the entire length of a shoe allows smoother transitions and adds unbelievable cushioning. Nike Grind rubber detailing brings superior traction and durability.

availability.name: Converse All Star HI
availability.description: The original performance basketball sneaker.  Leather, suede, or textile upper materials add style and durability. Cupsole construction provides comfort and support underfoot. Classic rubber outsole supplies traction. This Shoe runs one size big. We suggest you order 1 size smaller than your normal shoe size for Men and 2 sizes smaller than your normal shoe size for Women. Wt. 14.8 oz.

availability.name: PUMA RS-X3
availability.description: A sweet treat for your feet! The exciting new team-up of PUMA and HARIBO rejuvenates one of the most iconic silhouettes – the PUMA RS-X3 with colourful and delicious details. Inspired by the classic HARIBO Goldbears, the gummy bears, and the original HARIBO packaging, these shoes explore the happy world of HARIBO with street-style design and a playful vibe. The stunning chunky upper features a mix of bright colours and plush materials for a stylish and breathable fit. Other details include a translucent TPU layer formstrip with stitching details, a HARIBO Goldbears hangtag, and a graphic print on the heel piece. You’re bound to make an impression when you step out repping the PUMA RS-X3.  The rubber midsole ensures superior cushioning and flexibility. The rubber outsole delivers excellent traction and durability.

availability.name: Nike Waffle One
availability.description: Back with a blast! The new and fresh Nike Waffle One blends the best of Nike with revolutionary technology. Sporting a transparent mesh upper with soft suedes, these sneakers set your style standard so high you aren’t going to settle for anything lesser anymore. The seamless low-cut collar featuring soft edges gives this silhouette a classy look that feels comfortable. Do justice to your personal style with the Nike Waffle One. Nike Waffle One features:  Mixed upper provides durability and breathability and adds dimension and texture. Waffle-shaped dual-stacked midsole offers springy, soft, and superior cushioning. TPU heel clip adds support and an edgy DIY look. Iconic rubber waffle outsole with new moulded lugs enhances support, traction, and durability.

availability.name: Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit
availability.description: Modern meets classic in the thoughtfully crafted Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit. Made from at least 50% recycled material, its airy, easy-to-wear design features super stretchy, recycled FlyKnit on the upper. The stitched-on Swoosh and recycled TPU heel clip adds the perfect amount of flash as you float down the streets on incredibly soft VaporMax cushioning. Originally designed for running, the revolutionary VaporMax 2 Air unit is made from recycled material and provides more Air underfoot than ever before. The first 1-piece Air unit to run the entire length of a shoe allows for smoother transitions and adds unbelievable cushioning. Nike Air VaporMax 2021 Flyknit features:  The stretchy and supportive FlyKnit upper is made from post-industrial recycled yarn and creates a striking visual that's seamless, breathable, and feels as light as air. The traditional lacing adds ease-of-entry while webbing eyelets add a modern look. The seamless collar looks sleek and feels great while padding on the heel adds to the comfort. The recycled rubber on the sole adds durability and traction, putting a finishing touch on the shoe that lets you walk the talk. The Pinwheel logo and volt-coloured, recycled insole feels extra-cushy and signifies that the shoe contains at least 50% recycled materials by weight. The shoebox is made from recycled cardboard and doubles as a shipping box. Regrind rubber details deliver added traction and durability. TPU heel clip made from recycled plastics adds heritage styling.
